text:
The Pacific Grand Prix was a round of the Formula One World Championship in and. Both races were held at the Tanaka International Aida circuit(now Okayama International Circuit), a 2.3-mile track in the countryside in Aida (near Kobe), Japan.
Repeat winners (drivers).
"A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship."
Repeat winners (constructors).
"A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship."
Repeat winners (engine manufacturers).
"A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship."

"A pink background indicates an event which was not part of the Formula One World Championship."
